Ce projet se concentre sur deux banques de données distinctes :

-   *CO2 and Greenhouse Gas Emissions*

    URL : https://ourworldindata.org/co2-and-other-greenhouse-gas-emissions

    Github : https://github.com/owid/co2-data

-   *Life Expectancy At Birth*

    URL :

Par exemple:

> Les données proviennent entre autres de @owidenergy.

@owidenergy


::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell hash='import_cache/html/download_02e6e1fbfa76612c213ead0adc4ad42f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
URL <- "https://github.com/FAS1002/A22/raw/main/assets/fichiers/olympic_archive.zip"

base_path <- path("data", "raw")
fname <- paste0(today(),"olympic_archive.zip",
                sep = "_")

fname
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "2022-11-29olympic_archive.zip_"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
fpath <- path(base_path, fname)

fpath
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
data/raw/2022-11-29olympic_archive.zip_
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
download.file(url =URL, destfile = fpath)

# extraction
unzip(zipfile = fpath, 
      exdir = base_path)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning in unzip(zipfile = fpath, exdir = base_path): error -1 in extracting
from zip file
```
:::
:::
